Description:
Stack creating a VPC and launch EC2 instances within it.
    **WARNING** This template creates Amazon EC2 instances.
    You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create
    a stack from this template. **WARNING** This template creates
    role for the launching/deleting instances/subnets/interfaces.
    This role will invoke AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole, please see
    AWS Documentation for details on AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole.

ControllerProxyNetworkCIDR.default: Management Subnet for CyPerf Controller Proxy

CyPerfControllerProxyINstanceDNS.Description: DNS name of CyPerf Controller Proxy instance

AvailabilityZone.Default: <Select preffered availability zone from drop down>

KeyNameForCyPerfAgent.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair
KeyNameForCyPerfAgent.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the CyPerf instances

ControllerProxyNetworkCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
ControllerProxyNetworkCIDR.Description: This subnet is attached to CyPerf controller proxy

AgentControlCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
AgentControlCIDR.Description: CyPerf agents will use this subnet for control plane communication with controller proxy

AllowedSubnet.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
AllowedSubnet.Description: Subnet range allowed to access deployed AWS resources. Execute 'curl ifconfig.co' to know MyIP or google for “what is my IP”

AgentTestCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
AgentTestCIDR.Description: CyPerf agents will use this subnet for test traffic

Username.Description: Team or Individual email id responsible for the Stack

VPCCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

EC2RoleForTags.Description: Display Agents by custom tags in CyPerf UI

AuthUsername.Description: Username for agent to controller-proxy authentication

AuthPassword.Description: Password for agent to controller-proxy authentication

AuthFingerprint.Description: Fingerprint for agent to controller-proxy authentication - OPTIONAL
